body_html: I'm glad to hear it's building now! I'm going to close this issue, but feel free to open another one to track work on making the CMake build more incremental. (To set expectations, it's unlikely that anyone from the TF team will spend time on this, but we would welcome contributions that make things better for CMake users.)

body: I'm glad to hear it's building now! I'm going to close this issue, but feel free to open another one to track work on making the CMake build more incremental. (To set expectations, it's unlikely that anyone from the TF team will spend time on this, but we would welcome contributions that make things better for CMake users.)
